title: POLL which champ should i get
body:
So Ive been recommended a bunch of champs and I was wondering who is the most fun and overall best.
Im a beginner but I dont mind taking the time to figure out a slightly harder champ and I have around 6500 IP.
Thanks!

replies.body: Tbh, I think you should get Thresh :P, but from the options Yasuo is very strong atm with the crit healing mastery

Like I said before I think Yasuo should be your buy. He's a bit more difficult to learn, but learning to play him will improve your game overall, due to his squishyness, learning how to position yourself in a lane to full effect and learning timings of skills and what your damage output should look like.

That, and he is great fun too, 100% crit chance is nothing to sneeze at. Makes for great montages.
